messages.text:
Waqas ! Aaj 5 Star ky Sab Staff ke Joining Date sy Sallary Files ko set krdain.Attendance ky prints miss ho tu Kal Fahad sy lylain.Each staff ke Proper Monthly Sallary Files & Daily Working ky Prints bhi sab ke seprate Files mei set krlain.

Daily SOORA AI SY PIC CREATE Krny ke Seprate Working hy,Daily AI Soora sy Pic Create krky DANYAL KO DO. Real Estate Clients ke Sale/Rental Properties ke PICS/Videos Lo ya Visit krky KHUD VIDEOS/PICS lykr Danyal sy Same Pics/Vodeos North Nazimabad estate ky Social Media Pages per with details Upload krwao.Msg bhi kro Aaj Aap ny property ke video upload de hy ya Nahi?Sirf Aapni Working Msg kro.
